sentences: See on märgi kõik oma nimekirja.
Me peame leidma märgi järgmiseks kohtumisele.
context: The Estonian word 'märgi' is the partitive form of 'märk', which means 'sign', 'mark', or 'signature'. In this case, it indicates that some portion of a sign/mark/signature/token is being referred to. The partitive case is used when talking about an indefinite quantity or part of something.
